product_name: Sierra Designs Hurricane Rain Pants - Women's Petite
long_description: Keep hiking in iffy weather in the women's petite-size Sierra Designs Hurricane Rain Pants, with their comfortable, built-in belt and waterproofing that withstands the hardest downpours. 100% nylon fabric features a waterproof polyurethane coating as well as a durable water repellent finish to bead up water so it rolls off. Elasticized waistband has an adjustable belt to fine-tune the fit. Articulated knees offer a comfortable fit and freedom of movement. Zippered leg opening for easy on/off has storm flap to keep out the elements. Zippered thigh pocket holds hat or thin liner gloves. Pants pack into thigh pocket for easy stowing. The women's petite-size Sierra Designs Hurricane Rain Pants are cut to fit over light hiking pants or shorts.
